snippet: This triptych of short plays, part of the Under the Radar festival, is written and directed in hypnotic style by Toshiki Okada.
abstract: Ben Brantley reviews Chelfitsch Theater Company production of three short plays Hot Pepper, Air Conditioner, and the Farewell Speech, written and directed by Toshiki Okada, at the Japan Society as part of the Under the Radar Festival.
lead_paragraph: This triptych of short plays, part of the Under the Radar festival, is written and directed in hypnotic style by Toshiki Okada.
